title: Pearbuds, the World's Smallest Stereo Cordless Earbuds, Triple Kickstarter Fundraising Goal in Three Days
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 2:24 PM   Pear Designs 
SAN FRANCISCO, Sep. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Pear Designs , maker of the smallest Bluetooth earbuds on the market, has smashed through its $50,000 fundraising goal on Kickstarter to raise more than $350,000. Pearbuds are not only the smallest wireless earbuds on the market- they also boast a best-in-market six-hour battery life and a crisp, rich and cordless listening experience. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150903/263576 
Pearbuds have been specially engineered to hug a user's ears and stay securely fit all day long. The wireless, in-ear headphones last 6 hours on a single charge and can be fully charged again with the portable charging case in just 45 minutes. 
"Our early-market testing indicated that size and battery life were the two main pain points of current wireless earphones," Eric Tsoi, Pear Designs co-founder, said. "So those were the first two issues we focused on with Pearbuds. However, as audiophiles ourselves, we also took extra measures to make sure that the small size did not compromise sound quality. The result is crystal clear audio in the most convenient, Bluetooth earbud on the market." 
Pearbuds use balanced armature audio transducers that offer very low noise distortion and are optimally tuned to specific frequency ranges. Additionally, an AptX codec uses a special bit-rate reduction technique to offer Bluetooth sound that is indistinguishable from corded headphones. A proprietary-design module creates ultra-low latency between both earbuds, so a listener hears exactly the same thing in both ears, with no difference whatsoever. Pearbuds also include ambient noise cancellation to block out everything but the crisp, rich audio. 
By connecting via Bluetooth to a user's phone, Pearbuds are compatible with virtually any app: maps, workout trainers, audio books, games, videos, podcasts and more. They are also sweat-resistant and extremely light, making them ideal to connect with any fitness tracking devices and optimize a workout without getting tangled in cords. 
Pearbuds connect with any device that has Bluetooth, including iPhones, Android phones and most mp3 players. They work the same way any Bluetooth-enabled audio device does, so they are simple and ready to go out of the box. Pearbuds are available via the Kickstarter campaign for another 13 days. They can be pre-ordered starting at $119, which is $80 off the eventual retail price of $199. To order or learn more about Pearbuds, visit http://bit.ly/PearbudsKS . 
ABOUT PEAR DESIGNS 
Pear Designs is made up of a carefully selected team with the necessary skills and experience to bring technologies to market. Pearbuds aim to seamlessly meld the way we experience music with the feeling of complete freedom. Pear Designs brings in the best designers and engineers to produce a high quality listening device with unprecedented features. Learn more at http://www.peardesigns.io/ .
